title: [信息|综合|管理]BungeeSystem —— 更方便的管理你的群组吧[BC]
author: Mr.Luans
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Mr.Luans 于 2019-12-12 18:03 编辑 



授权搬运




QQ截图20191212175347.png (17.68 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2019-12-12 17:54 上传






作者&图片介绍This is a bungee system currently in BETA.If there are any errors please report to my Discord server!Discord: (https://discord.gg/YXee8SM)
个人翻译：该插件目前处于测试版本，如果发现有什么错误请报告至作者的Discord。Discord: (https://discord.gg/YXee8SM)



指令&权限指令
/Addserver <服务器名称> <IP> <端口> <Restricted> <MOTD>  ——添加子服指令缩写：/addbungeeserver该指令可以在不需要重启BC以及修改config文件时，直接在游戏中添加子服，并即时生效。
/Removeserver <服务器名称>  ——删除子服该指令可以在不需要重启BC以及修改config文件时，直接在游戏中删除子服，并即时生效。
/Broadcast <服务器名称> <消息>（全服公告 /broadcast global <消息>）指令缩写：/bc, /bcast, /rundruf该指令可以向指定或所有服务器发送公告消息
/Chatclear <服务器名称> （全服聊天清除 /chatclear global）指令缩写：/clearchat, /cc该指令可以清除指定或所有服务器的聊天消息
/Pchatclear
指令缩写：/pclearchat, /pcc该指令可以清除BC控制台上的部分信息（该功能仅本人初步测试，如还有其他用处请回复本帖，谢谢）
/Lobby指令缩写：/hub, /leave该指令可以让你快速回到大厅
/Ping指令缩写：/ms查询个人延迟
/Title指令缩写：/titel, /gtitle, /gtitel用于向全服发送Title信息
/Playertitle指令缩写：/ptitle, /titleplayer, /ptitel用于向指定玩家发送Title信息权限





















bungeesystem.addserver  ——允许添加子服
bungeesystem.broadcast ——允许发送全服公告
bungeesystem.chatclear ——允许使用聊天清除
bungeesystem.chatclear.global ——允许使用全服聊天清除
bungeesystem.chatclear.bypass ——无视聊天清除
bungeesystem.chatclear.private ——（不知该如何说明，具体应该没有多大用处）
bungeesystem.removeserver ——允许删除子服
bungeesystem.title ——允许使用/Title
bungeesystem.playertitle ——允许使用/Playertitle


配置文件（V1.1.0.3）############################################################
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
# | Notes | #
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
############################################################

# BungeeSystem Plugin Configuration:

# Please report Bugs via Spigot

# If you want to use special characters in this document, such as accented letters, you MUST save the file as UTF-8, not ANSI.
# If you receive an error when BungeeSystem loads, ensure that:
# - No tabs are present: YAML only allows spaces!
# - Indents are correct: YAML hierarchy is based entirely on indentation
# - You have "escaped" all apostrophes in your text: If you want to write "don"t", for example, write "don""t" instead (note the doubled apostrophe)
# - Text with symbols is enclosed in single or double quotation marks

############################################################
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
# | BungeeSystem (Global) | #
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
############################################################

# For a list of commands and permissions check the bungee.yml

# Never change this value
Config-Version: "1.1"

# NOT IMPLEMENTET
MySQL:
Host: "127.0.0.1"
Database: "BungeeSystem"
User: "DB_Username"
Password: "DB_Password"

############################################################
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
# | BungeeSystem (System) | #
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
############################################################

# Here you can set the Protocol Version.
# Example: https://i.imgur.com/NXiH6SZ.png

Protocol: "Calradia v.1.8.x - 1.13"

# Here you can set the maximum number of players who can join the proxy server.
Maxplayers: 32

# Here you can set fakeplayers to be displayed in the slot display.
# - The function requires a server reboot.
Fakeplayers: 0

# Here you can set whether the slots should be expanded dynamically. (e.g 1 Player joins = + 1 Slot)
# - To enable or disable this feature set 'Enable' to 'true' or 'false'.
Dynamic:
Enable: false

# Here you can set the slot hover message.
Hovermessage:
- '&8&m---------&f &bCalradia - Network &8&m---------'
- '&8'
- '&8? &7Forum: &6https://www.example.com'
- '&8? &7Shop: &6https://buy.example.com'
- '&8? &7Voting: &6https://example.com'
- '&8? &7Teamspeak: &6ts.example.com'
- '&8'
- '&8&m---------&f &bCalradia - Network &8&m---------'

Motd:
1: '&bCalradia.de &7- &bNetwork &7[&a1.8 &e- &c1.13&7]'
2: '&7- &3Minecraft Server Network &7-'

############################################################
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
# | BungeeSystem (Commands) | #
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
############################################################

# Lobby Configuration:

# Here you can set the lobbyserver.
# - To enable or disable the /Lobby command set the 'Enable' value to 'true' or 'false'.

Lobby:
Enable: false
Server: "Lobby-01"


# Socialmedia Configuration:

# Here you can enable or disable the Socialmedia commands.
# - To enable or disable the command set the value to 'true' or 'false'.

Socialmedia:
Discord: true
Facebook: true
Teamspeak: true
Vote: true
Webseite: true
Youtube: true


# Title Configuration:

# This is in ticks, so 20 would be 1 second!
# fadeIn: The time the title takes to fade in.
# stay: The time the title is showed to the player.
# fadeOut: The time the title takes to fade out.

Title:
fadeIn: 5
stay: 60
fadeOut: 5

############################################################
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
# | BungeeSystem (Language) | #
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
############################################################

# Here you can adjust the language:
# Available languages: german, english, spanish

Language: "english"
复制代码

插件下载
BungeeSystem为免费插件请前往原帖下载，支持作者https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/bungeecord-network-system-bungeesystem.59109/

更新日志
2019.12.12- 修复BungeeTeleport消息- 修复Favicon 标志错误- 增加BungeeTeleport 消息: Teleport_Sender- 增加新权限bungeesystem.Command.bungeetelport- 增加新命令/Bungeeteleport <Player> -能够传送到目标玩家的所在服务器- 新增MOTD- 新增Dynamic Slots- 新增Fake Players- 新增HoverMessage

replies.txt_content:

请问这里的权限怎么加呢，我尝试在子服加权限，但是显示没有 bc启动哪里我把我的ID改成admin也没用 ...
